title: Baird's Loeb: Hotel REITS At Risk From Brexit Travel Cuts (AUD)
itunes:title: Baird's Loeb: Hotel REITS At Risk From Brexit Travel Cuts (AUD)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: David Loeb, Baird Senior Research Analyst, to discuss his outlook on the hotel space as the summer travel season kicks off and Brexit takes hold.
